data.title: 2nd Sem B.com and BBA English Notes
data.meta_description:
2nd sem B.com and BBA English notes - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document provides an excerpt from Charlie Chaplin's autobiography where he discusses his early life and career. Some key details include:

- Charlie Chaplin was born in London, England in 1889 and became renowned for his films in the early 20th century. 

- He was a British comedian, producer, writer, director, and composer who is widely considered one of the greatest comic artists in film history. 

- Some of his most famous films include The Gold Rush and Modern Times, which helped establish his iconic character of The Tramp.
